== Mulayam (627818) ==

Mulayam is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1112 hectares and harbouring 2206 households with total population of 9465 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 4692 and female population is 4773. Scheduled Caste Population is 610 and Scheduled Tribes population is 168. Census Location Code of the village is 627818<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate female population: 4060 (85.06%)
